item.title: Working jail command plz
item.dc:creator: @Holy_Archer Holy Archer
item.description:
@Holy_Archer wrote:

Bmaw:

Then change the rights to 1…

With his unjail having “1” would mean only 2+ rights can use the command.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.resetPos();
     p.action = 0;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been unjailed by " + playerName);
     sM("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }

}[/code]
For unjail, and this is jail.

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
		p.toY = 3285;
		p.action = 1;
                    p.sM("You have been jailed by " + playerName);
		sM("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }
        }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Working jail command plz
item.dc:creator: @ionforeva ionforeva
item.description:
@ionforeva wrote:

and ehres the unjail bit

if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights > 2) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.resetPos();
     p.action = 0;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been unjailed by " + playerName);
     sM("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }

}

Read full topic

item.title: Working jail command plz
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Try mine:

[code] if(command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“urname”) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
		p.toY = 3285;
		p.action = 1;
                    p.sM("You have been jailed by " + playerName);
		sM("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }
        }[/code]

Change my name to urs.
